risks.peristiwaRisiko: Kebocoran data customer akibat vulnerability dalam sistem authentication
risks.sumberRisiko: Sistem authentication yang tidak ter-update dengan security patch terbaru
risks.dampakKualitatif: Kehilangan kepercayaan customer, reputasi perusahaan menurun, potential legal liability
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Estimasi kerugian finansial hingga Rp 2.5 miliar untuk compensation dan legal fees
risks.kontrolEksisting: Multi-factor authentication, regular security audit, encrypted database storage

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Key developer meninggalkan perusahaan di tengah fase critical development
risks.sumberRisiko: Kurangnya documentation dan knowledge transfer, dependency pada individual expertise
risks.dampakKualitatif: Delay project timeline, quality degradation, team morale menurun
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Delay 3-6 bulan dengan cost impact Rp 800 juta untuk hiring dan training replacement
risks.kontrolEksisting: Knowledge documentation, pair programming, retention bonus program

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Fraud transaksi melalui compromised mobile device atau malware
risks.sumberRisiko: Keamanan device user yang tidak terkontrol, potential malware infection
risks.dampakKualitatif: Kerugian nasabah, loss of trust, regulatory scrutiny dari otoritas perbankan
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Potential fraud loss Rp 5 miliar per tahun, regulatory fine hingga Rp 10 miliar
risks.kontrolEksisting: Device binding, transaction limit, real-time fraud detection, SMS OTP verification

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Non-compliance dengan regulasi OJK terkait mobile banking security requirements
risks.sumberRisiko: Perubahan regulasi yang frequent, complexity dalam implementation compliance features
risks.dampakKualitatif: Sanksi regulatori, potential suspension of services, reputational damage
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Regulatory fine hingga Rp 25 miliar, opportunity cost dari service suspension
risks.kontrolEksisting: Regular compliance audit, legal consultation, dedicated compliance team

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Data customer tidak dapat di-migrate dengan benar dari sistem lama
risks.sumberRisiko: Incompatibility antara format data lama dan baru, data corruption during migration
risks.dampakKualitatif: Loss of customer history, degraded customer service quality, customer dissatisfaction
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Cost untuk data recovery Rp 500 juta, potential customer churn 15% dengan value Rp 2 miliar
risks.kontrolEksisting: Data backup strategy, migration testing in staging environment, rollback procedures

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Server overload saat flash sale atau peak traffic period
risks.sumberRisiko: Insufficient server capacity planning, lack of auto-scaling capability
risks.dampakKualitatif: Poor user experience, lost sales opportunity, brand reputation impact
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Lost revenue Rp 1.2 miliar per incident, infrastructure upgrade cost Rp 800 juta
risks.kontrolEksisting: Load balancer, CDN implementation, performance monitoring tools

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Payment gateway failure during high transaction volume
risks.sumberRisiko: Third-party payment provider limitations, network latency issues
risks.dampakKualitatif: Customer frustration, abandoned carts, negative reviews and complaints
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Revenue loss Rp 800 juta per hour during failure, customer acquisition cost increase
risks.kontrolEksisting: Multiple payment gateway redundancy, real-time monitoring, automatic failover

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Supplier data tidak dapat terintegrasi dengan sistem baru
risks.sumberRisiko: Heterogeneous supplier systems, lack of standardized data format
risks.dampakKualitatif: Supply chain disruption, delayed procurement process, supplier relationship strain
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Operational delay cost Rp 1.5 miliar, manual process overhead Rp 300 juta per month
risks.kontrolEksisting: API integration standards, supplier onboarding program, data mapping tools
